about-me.name: About
about-me.presentation: HelloðŸ‘‹ I am 24 years old and a full-stack JavaScript developer. After obtaining my degree in electronic and computer systems, I decided to specialize in web development. I now have almost two years of experience as a full-stack JavaScript developer!

overcraft.name: Overcraft
overcraft.description: Overcraft is a platform where StarCraft 2 players can create, organize, and share their build orders to better learn and optimize their strategies. It features an interactive mode with a timer to execute builds in real-time, as well as customization and editing options.

web-cv.name: Web CV
web-cv.description: My Web CV is a modern and interactive application developed with Next.js, offering smooth navigation and an optimized experience with a polished interface and dark mode. It is designed to present my background in a professional and dynamic way. ðŸš€

godot-tower-defense.name: Godot Tower Defense
godot-tower-defense.description: Tower defense game developed with Godot Engine, inspired by the game Vector TD.

universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.name: UniversitÃ© CÃ´te d'Azur - Ulysseus
universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.description: Development of applications for the Ulysseus alliance of institutions. The main technologies used are JavaScript, Python, Linux, and Docker.

match-4-cooperation.name: Match4Cooperation
match-4-cooperation.description: Ulysseus Match4Cooperation aims to bring together the research community of the Ulysseus European University. It allows researchers from the Ulysseus network to exchange their work, collaborate on European project calls, and find mobility opportunities.

developed-features.1: Optimization of the backend performance of the group creation system.
developed-features.2: Implementation of a search bar allowing users to find others based on their university.

invenio-rdm.name: Invenio RDM
invenio-rdm.description: InvenioRDM is an open-source platform developed by CERN for managing and sharing research data, offering advanced features for depositing, searching, and preserving scientific data.

developed-features.1: Redesign of the main page displaying the Ulysseus alliance universities, with a button linking to the publications of researchers from the selected university.
developed-features.2: Improvement of native search (limited to publications) via the search bar, now also displaying profiles and organizations containing a reference to the specified name.
developed-features.3: Merging of an external application (form and data about researchers and their areas of expertise) and full integration into InvenioRDM.

airflow.name: AirFlow
airflow.description: Development of an automated monitoring system (PINGER) using AirFlow to check the availability of our web applications and track the validity of SSL certificates on our various domains.

developed-features.1: Creation of a `pinger` script running every 5 minutes to check the availability of all services. In case of unavailability, an email is sent with the reason for the detected error.
developed-features.2: Development of a script to check SSL certificates for domain names, with reminders sent 15 days before expiration.

student-portal.name: Student Portal
student-portal.description: Development of a centralized student portal to display events and activities organized across different campuses, making information more accessible and encouraging student participation.

developed-features.1: Application developed from scratch: initialization of frontend, backend repositories, and deployment.
developed-features.2: Deployment and production of the complete application on a route of the Ulysseus domain name.
developed-features.3: Deployment of the application on a route of the Ulysseus domain, followed by communication of the URL for feedback collection and continuous improvement.

microsoft-azure.name: Microsoft - Azure
microsoft-azure.description: Automation of the process of adding new users to the Ulysseus tenant via a Python script, facilitating access management and user integration.

developed-features.1: Improvement of the user account creation script on Ulysseus' Microsoft Azure tenant.
developed-features.2: Creation of a script for synchronizing distribution lists from a given Excel file: adding and removing members and owners of the alias.

servers-details.name: Servers Details
servers-details.description: Automation of retrieving detailed information about servers, including performance, status, and configuration data, followed by generating an Excel report for easy tracking and quick analysis.

developed-features.1: Retrieval of information for each server, including the installed Docker version and the versions of Docker images used.

licence.name: Bachelor's Degree in Embedded Systems
licence.description: Programming languages: C / C++ and VHDL (PIC16, ARDUINO, STM32). Real-time operating systems with FreeRTOS. Linux and Windows operating systems.

bts.name: BTS in Digital Systems
bts.description: Study of circuit diagrams, design, and troubleshooting of electronic boards, signal analysis, Arduino programming, HTML/CSS.
